title: The Scarred Lands
goal: Kaelen ventures beyond the Sanctum, directly witnessing the world's decay and the insidious reach of the Shadow Blight.

beats.summary: Kaelen, accompanied by Lyra, ventures into the lands surrounding the Sanctum, eager to witness the scope of the world's transformation.
They encounter widespread evidence of the Shadow Blight: blighted crops, unnaturally withered forests, and a palpable sense of dread clinging to the land.
In a struggling village, they witness the fear and resignation of the common folk, their lives overshadowed by the encroaching darkness.
Kaelen senses a familiar, yet deeply corrupted, magical signature emanating from the blight, a twisting of ancient energies he once knew.
Lyra explains the gradual, insidious nature of the Shadow Blight, how it saps life and hope, leaving only despair in its wake.
